acf.title: Bronze Package
acf.desciption: Along with a full day of filming and several videos, the Bronze Package includes a highlight film that you’ll want to share with everyone. We take your entire day and create a unique, creative, and truly cinematic film that captures the heart of your relationship and marriage. The Highlight Film is perfect for sharing online with friends and family, those who couldn’t make it, and those who want to relive the day all over again.

inclusions.inclusion: Reception Film (first dances, toasts, and cake cutting)
60-second Teaser Film released the week after the wedding
2 videographers/2 4K cameras with professional wireless microphones

showcase_videos.short_description: In the ten years of filming weddings, we've never been able to film a slow-motion ring spin using two grooms’ rings. Today, that changes. Ryan and Eddie are the definition of true love. I mean, just listen to how Ryan recalls the first time he met Eddie: he said he didn't want their phone call to ever end. And watch how Eddie looks at Ryan: he says he can hardly describe what it feels like to be loved so strongly. Here's to many more years of being truly in love. Cheers to Ryan and Eddie!

gallery_group.caption: Two of the coolest guys we’ve had the honor of working with.
Both of them have or had modeling careers. Can’t you tell??

showcase_videos.short_description: One of the best parts of being able to film so many different weddings is watching a bride and a groom just share their love with each other. Eric is a perfect example of this, when you see his reaction as Teresa walks down the aisle.  You will see it too. You can see just pure happiness and love in his eyes and that is what a wedding should be about; love. Cheers to Eric and Teresa!

gallery_group.caption: The way that Eric and Teresa's family transformed the Royal China Restaurant into a reception venue was nothing short of amazing.
The traditional dress that Teresa wore was absolutely stunning.

acf.title: Silver Package
acf.desciption: This package includes everything listed in the Bronze, but you get two extra hours of coverage, a longer Highlight Film, and a Reception Film that includes all of the main parts of your reception!

inclusions.inclusion: Reception Film (first dances, toasts, and cake cutting)
60-second Teaser Film released the week after the wedding
2 videographers/2 4K cameras with professional wireless microphones

showcase_videos.short_description: Josh and Katie’s wedding film was featured in BRIDES in 2021, but their wedding day was timeless! When we heard that they moved their location from Miami to Aspen, of course we were excited! We had only been to Colorado one other time before, but judging by how pretty Aspen was in the movie "Dumb and Dumber," we knew we were in for a good time – and so were Josh and Katie. Even though they had a sign that said, "Weed is legal. Dancing is illegal,” sometimes you can't help but create your own dance floor and boogie. Pandemics are so weird, but here's to making the most of it! Cheers to Josh and Katie!

gallery_group.caption: Visiting Aspen was a bucket list item for sure. Dumb & Dumber didn’t do it justice.
Hotel Jerome was such a classy venue for Josh and Katie’s wedding.

showcase_videos.short_description: We had the extreme privilege of filming Bonnie's sister's wedding several years ago in Atlanta, and when the opportunity came to film Bonnie and Dylan's in Oakland, we already knew how special it would be. These two are so into each other, and not in a weird, off-putting kinda way, but in a ‘when they're in the moment, it's hard to break them from it’ kinda way. They go to a special place when they're together, and it's covetous. Here's to a lifetime of being all about the other person. Cheers to Dylan and Bonnie!

gallery_group.caption: Oakland is such a cool city with some of the best tacos!
We love a bride who isn’t scared of a little pop of color at her wedding.

acf.title: Gold Package
acf.desciption: This package includes everything listed in the Silver, but you get an even longer Highlight Film, a second Teaser Film, a custom hard drive to store your final videos, and raw footage! Yep, you get every single clip we record on your wedding day.

inclusions.inclusion: Reception Film (first dances, toasts, and cake cutting)
60-second Teaser Film released the week after the wedding
2 videographers/3 4K cameras with professional wireless microphones
Hard drive with digital copies of each film
Custom, handmade keepsake included with hard drive
Hard drive with raw footage of wedding day

showcase_videos.short_description:
We were honored to have Eric and Shannon’s wedding film featured on Martha Stewart Weddings, and for good reason! Dromoland Castle was the perfect setting for their wedding. It has the charm that the two of them encapsulate, the beauty that they both share, and a wow factor that is absolutely undeniable.

Most destination weddings have a slightly slimmer crowd, but the two of them are so loved that they likely would have had the exact same guest count if they tied the knot in New York. Here's to keeping those friends and family members close! Cheers to Eric and Shannon!

gallery_group.caption: Some dreams come true! Especially when you get married at a castle in Ireland.
The reception was so energetic, the walls of Dromoland were shaking!

showcase_videos.short_description: The beautiful thing about Cal and Georgia's wedding wasn’t just the amazing table settings, or the bright orange sunset, or them being so insanely in love It was the bombshell of a surprise they laid on us while exchanging their vows: Cal and Georgia are expecting their first baby. Human baby that is. Otis, the dog, is very much their baby, too. With the recent passing of Cal's father, there's nothing more beautiful than bringing new life into this world. Here’s to their growing family! Cheers to Cal and Georgia!

gallery_group.caption: We were one of the firsts to find out about Cal & Georgia being a couple months pregnant on their wedding day!
Can we take up residence in Vermont and film here every weekend??

acf.title: Platinum Package
acf.desciption: This package includes everything listed in the Gold, plus Rehearsal Dinner coverage with a video of all the speeches, two extra hours of coverage on the wedding day, and an even longer Highlight Film. You get it all!

inclusions.inclusion: Up to 3 hours of rehearsal dinner coverage
Reception Film (first dances, toasts, and cake cutting)
60-second Teaser Film released the week after the wedding
2 videographers/3 4K cameras with professional wireless microphones
Hard drive with digital copies of each film
Custom, handmade keepsake included with hard drive
Hard drive with raw footage of wedding day

showcase_videos.short_description: Rehearsal dinner: Casino Night. Popping bottles. Lots and lots of friends and family on the week the country opened back up. This is only a fraction of the unique characteristics that describe Miguel and Riley's wedding weekend. Right before their grand exit, Riley and Miguel pulled our team to the side and told us how grateful they were to have us as their videographers. It was kind of a surreal moment because their guests were lined up waiting for them to leave the reception, the band was tearing down, and there was movement all around us, but they took the time out of their wedding day to tell us how thankful they were. You'll hear it in multiple speeches, but this is the level of thoughtfulness that these two have for others. They were constantly putting others before themselves. Riley gave one of our filmmakers a gift for their daughter, she made a birthday cake for her grandma, and they threw one massive post-Covid party for their friends and family. Here's to a lifetime of selflessness. Cheers to Miguel and Riley!

gallery_group.caption: Can all Rehearsal Dinners be casino themed please??
We would also like to go cruising on a very expensive boat after every first look please.

showcase_videos.short_description: We are truly at a loss of words to describe Beau and Ashley’s wedding. It was beautiful. It was magical. It was emotional. Ashley’s dad, in describing her, said there are so many nice things to say about Ashley, but she is beautiful on the inside and out. And I think we’ll steal his line in describing their wedding. Of course, the couple is beautiful, as well as the decor, the venue, the guests, the food, and so on and so on. But beyond the external, the true beauty of the day lies within the sweetness and charm that Beau and Ashley share with everyone; their vendors, their guests, and each other. We had just met them, and they made us feel like family. Here’s to a lifetime of being beautiful on the inside and out. Cheers to Beau and Ashley!

gallery_group.caption: Not only is Lowndes Grove the location where Outer Banks is filmed, but the perfect back drop for Ashley & Beau’s wedding.
The sunsets in Charleston are some kind of magical.

ceremony_information.songs: This song, That song, Another song
ceremony_information.artists: That great artisit, This great artisit, Another artist
